publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1759 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Scotland the What—That the Parliament congratulates Scotland the What stars, George Donald, Steven Robertson and Buff Hardie, on receiving the freedom of the city of Aberdeen; notes with appreciation the special brand of local humour that they brought to a global audience, and further notes the great work that they did in publicising not only Scotland but also the Doric dialect.
S3M-1759 Congratulations to Scotland the What (lodged on 22 April 2008) Jack McConnell*

S3M-1759 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Scotland the What—That the Parliament congratulates Scotland the What stars, George Donald, Steven Robertson and Buff Hardie, on receiving the freedom of the city of Aberdeen; notes with appreciation the special brand of local humour that they brought to a global audience, and further notes the great work that they did in publicising not only Scotland but also the Doric dialect. Supported by: Jack McConnell, Michael Matheson*

S3M-1759 Congratulations to Scotland the What (lodged on 22 April 2008) Nanette Milne*, Jamie Stone*, Elizabeth Smith*, Sandra White*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Kenneth Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Stuart McMillan*, Jamie McGrigor*, Christina McKelvie*, Robin Harper*, Robert Brown*, Rob Gibson*

S3M-1759 Congratulations to Scotland the What (lodged on 22 April 2008) George Foulkes*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Lewis Macdonald*, Alex Johnstone*, Mary Scanlon*, Bill Wilson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-1759 Congratulations to Scotland the What (lodged on 22 April 2008) Nigel Don*, Alison McInnes*
S3M-1759 Congratulations to Scotland the What (lodged on 22 April 2008) Gil Paterson*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-1759 Congratulations to Scotland the What (lodged on 22 April 2008) Ross Finnie*
S3M-1759 Congratulations to Scotland the What (lodged on 22 April 2008) Dave Thompson*
